author: k_i_ko
body: There’s already few, in term of big reserves i pick tsxv:ipg imperial mining group, and regarding the location of the mine which plays a big role in distribution and shipping i also pick ipg because its located in Quebec and quebec is the capital of aluminum when it comes to canada. For power consumption i also choose ipg because Quebec have the cheapest electricity in canada

author: Sweetloo91
body:
IPG has crappy management. Look at the past history of the financings they’ve done and how many cheap ass warrants they have issued. I emailed the ceo to ask him exactly how many warrants were outstanding and his reply was:

“I’m sorry we don’t discuss our share structure.” LOL. Even though I can dig through and find this information if I take the time, what kind of ceo tries to hide this info from his shareholders? Total turd. He does this because he knows how crappy it is and how many 5 cent warrants he issued on financings that were done at 5 cents with the full warrant
